text: Eirik Bergum Skaasheim (born 22 January 1993) is a Norwegian footballer who plays as a defender for NHH FK. ==Career== Skaasheim was born in Balestrand and he started his career with Sogndal. Skaasheim joined Sogndal in 2011.
